title: spam folder on Yahoo webmail into Thunderbird
content: I recently lived thru the Cox-Yahoo conversion. Yahoo webmail has a folder called SPAM..where all the what I call JUNK goes to but in TB but it never gets into the TB JUNK folder..I can only see it on webmail Yahoo..How do I point the TB JUNK to link with this SPAM Yahoo folder please?
creator: oldbob2

title: Email access slow
content: Is Microsoft Windows 11 sabotaging thunderbird email by slowing it down? I have had problems accessing my email ever since I got a new HP laptop with Windows 11.
